location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in charge at the Bushire Residency to John Hinde Pelly, Deputy Military Paymaster General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging a communication dated 11 October 1811, which instructed a retrenchment to be made from the disbursements in the Garrison Pay Office for June 1811. It is noted that this sum has already been brought to the credit of the civil books on the Residency accounts.
